CustomField.formula: IF ( FA_Sounder_Test_Completed__c , "Sounder Testing was completed by Hentland Technician on "& TEXT(DAY(FA_Sounder_Test_Date__c))&"/" & TEXT(MONTH (FA_Sounder_Test_Date__c))&"/" & TEXT(YEAR(FA_Sounder_Test_Date__c)) , IF ( Sounder_Test_Completed_By__c <> "", "Sounder Testing was completed by "&Sounder_Test_Completed_By__c&" on "& TEXT(DAY(FA_Sounder_Test_Date__c))&"/" & TEXT(MONTH (FA_Sounder_Test_Date__c))&"/" & TEXT(YEAR(FA_Sounder_Test_Date__c)) , ""))
CustomField.label: Sounder Test Message
